text: May Blood, Baroness Blood, MBE"Celebrated citizen: Baroness May Blood MBE", City Matters, Septemberâ€“October 2009. Belfast City Council. (26 May 1938 - 21 October 2022) was a Labour politician. She was a member of the British House of Lords. She was born and raised in Belfast. Since 1994, she has been an Information Officer of the Greater Shankill Partnership and is a founding member of the Northern Ireland Women's Coalition. She was appointed a Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 1995 Birthday Honours. Blood died on 21 October 2022, at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile, theyworkforyou.com; accessed 29 March 2014. * Baroness Blood, Grassroot Diplomat Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Belfast Category:Labour Life Peers
title: May Blood, Baroness Blood
